Uses of Interface
org.apache.solr.core.MapSerializable

  • Packages that use MapSerializable 
    Package Description
    org.apache.solr.core
    Core classes implementin Solr internals and the management of SolrCores
    org.apache.solr.search
    APIs and classes for parsing and processing search requests
    org.apache.solr.update
    APIs and classes for managing index updates

    • Uses of MapSerializable in org.apache.solr.core

      Classes in org.apache.solr.core that implement MapSerializable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConfigOverlay
      This class encapsulates the config overlay json file.
      class  PluginInfo
      An Object which represents a Plugin of any type
      class  RequestParams
      The class encapsulates the request time parameters .
      class  SolrConfig
      Provides a static reference to a Config object modeling the main configuration data for a a Solr instance -- typically found in "solrconfig.xml".
      static class  SolrConfig.HttpCachingConfig 
      static class  SolrConfig.JmxConfiguration 
      static class  SolrConfig.UpdateHandlerInfo 

    • Uses of MapSerializable in org.apache.solr.search

      Classes in org.apache.solr.search that implement MapSerializable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CacheConfig
      Contains the knowledge of how cache config is stored in the solrconfig.xml file, and implements a factory to create caches.

    • Uses of MapSerializable in org.apache.solr.update

      Classes in org.apache.solr.update that implement MapSerializable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SolrIndexConfig
      This config object encapsulates IndexWriter config params, defined in the <indexConfig> section of solrconfig.xml
